content:
PropertyValue Class

Definition

Maintains a data model for the value of a property in the property grid.

In this Article

public abstract class PropertyValue : System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Inheritance
System.Object
PropertyValue

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Constructors

PropertyValue(PropertyEntry)

Initializes a new instance of the PropertyValue class with the parent property set to a specified PropertyEntry object.

protected PropertyValue (System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry parentProperty);
parentProperty
PropertyEntry

The PropertyEntry that corresponds to this PropertyValue.

Properties

CanConvertFromString

When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value* can be converted from a string.

public abstract bool CanConvertFromString { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the property value can be converted from a string; otherwise, false.

CatchExceptions

Gets a value that indicates whether exceptions thrown during property value getting and setting should be caught or should be propagated directly to the caller.

protected virtual bool CatchExceptions { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if exceptions are caught; false if exceptions are propagated to the caller.

Remarks

This is based upon whether there are any subscribers to the PropertyValueException event.

Collection

When implemented in a derived class, gets a collection of PropertyValue instances that correspond to items in a collection when stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.IsCollection* verifies that the property is a collection.

public abstract System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueCollection Collection { get; }
Value
PropertyValueCollection

A PropertyValueCollection object that is a collection of property value instances.

HasSubProperties

When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the type of this property supports sub-properties.

public abstract bool HasSubProperties { get; }
Value
Boolean

A Boolean that, when stem.Boolean.True, verifies that the type supports sub-properties, otherwise stem.Boolean.False.

Remarks

Typical implementations will use a TypeConverter to verify whether sub-properties exist.

IsCollection

When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether this PropertyValue is a collection.

public abstract bool IsCollection { get; }
Value
Boolean

A Boolean that, when stem.Boolean.True, verifies that the property value is a collection, otherwise stem.Boolean.False.

IsDefaultValue

When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value* is the default value for the property.

public abstract bool IsDefaultValue { get; }
Value
Boolean

A Boolean that, when stem.Boolean.True, verifies that the value is the default, otherwise stem.Boolean.False.

IsMixedValue

When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether multiple objects contain this property and have different values.

public abstract bool IsMixedValue { get; }
Value
Boolean

A Boolean that, when stem.Boolean.True, verifies that multiple objects contain this property, otherwise stem.Boolean.False.

Remarks

If <xref:System.Boolean.True>, Value will return null and StringValue will return Empty.

ParentProperty

Gets the parent PropertyEntry when the property implementation occurs in a host environment.

public System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry ParentProperty { get; }
Value
PropertyEntry

A PropertyEntry object that represents the parent property.

Source

When implemented in a derived class, gets a PropertyValueSource object that contains information about where this property value is coming from.

public abstract System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueSource Source { get; }
Value
PropertyValueSource

A PropertyValueSource object that contains property value source information.

StringValue

Gets or sets a stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value* as a String.

public string StringValue { get; set; }
Value
String

A String version of the stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*.

SubProperties

When implemented in a derived class, gets a collection of sub-properties as PropertyEntry instances.

public abstract System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntryCollection SubProperties { get; }
Value
PropertyEntryCollection

A PropertyEntryCollection of instances.

Value

Gets or sets a property value in the underlying collection of property data.

public object Value { get; set; }
Value
System.Object

A property value Object.

Methods

ClearValue()

When implemented in a derived class, clears the PropertyValue so that it is unset.

public abstract void ClearValue ();

ConvertStringToValue(String)

When implemented in a derived class, converts the specified stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.StringValue* to a stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*.

protected abstract object ConvertStringToValue (string value);
value
String

The String value to convert to a stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*.

Returns
System.Object

An Object value.

ConvertValueToString(Object)

When implemented in a derived class, converts the specified stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value* to a stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.StringValue*.

protected abstract string ConvertValueToString (object value);
value
System.Object

The stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value* to convert to a string.

Returns
String

A String version of the stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*.

GetValueCore()

When implemented in a derived class, returns a stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*.

protected abstract object GetValueCore ();
Returns
System.Object

A property value Object.

NotifyRootValueChanged()

Raises the RootValueChanged event when the underlying value type is changed externally, as on the design surface.

protected virtual void NotifyRootValueChanged ();

NotifySubPropertyChanged()

Raises the SubPropertyChanged event when one of the sub-properties of this property has changed.

protected void NotifySubPropertyChanged ();

OnPropertyChanged(PropertyChangedEventArgs)

Raises the PropertyChanged event with the specified PropertyChangedEventArgs objects.

protected virtual void OnPropertyChanged (System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs e);
e
PropertyChangedEventArgs

A PropertyChangedEventArgs object that provides the name of the property that changed.

OnPropertyChanged(String)

Raises the PropertyChanged event that uses the name of the property that changed.

protected virtual void OnPropertyChanged (string propertyName);
propertyName
String

The name of the property that changed.

OnPropertyValueException(PropertyValueExceptionEventArgs)

Default implementation that raises the PropertyValueException event when PropertyValue properties experience failure getting or setting values in the underlying collection of data.

protected virtual void OnPropertyValueException (System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueExceptionEventArgs e);
e
PropertyValueExceptionEventArgs

A PropertyValueExceptionEventArgs that provides information about the get or set failure that occurred.

SetValueCore(Object)

When implemented in a derived class, sets the stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*.

protected abstract void SetValueCore (object value);
value
System.Object

The object to be set in the underlying collection of data.

ValidateValue(Object)

When implemented in a derived class, throws an exception if verification of the specified value object shows it to be invalid.

protected abstract void ValidateValue (object valueToValidate);
valueToValidate
System.Object

The object whose value is verified.

Events

PropertyChanged

Occurs when properties or sub-properties of the PropertyValue object has changed.

public event System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventHandler PropertyChanged;

PropertyValueException

Event used by host implementations for error handling.

public event EventHandler<System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueExceptionEventArgs> PropertyValueException;

RootValueChanged

Occurs when the stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value* or stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.StringValue* property is updated as a result of the PropertyValue value being changed.

public event EventHandler RootValueChanged;

SubPropertyChanged

Occurs when sub-properties are updated as a result of the PropertyValue being changed.

public event EventHandler SubPropertyChanged;
